Enums/NXMCallHandler.html#/c:@E@NXMCallH.name: NXMCallHandlerInApp
Enums/NXMCallHandler.html#/c:@E@NXMCallH.abstract: A default call behavior - use it only for IP to IP calls.

Enums/NXMCallHandler.html#/c:@E@NXMCallH.name: NXMCallHandlerServer
Enums/NXMCallHandler.html#/c:@E@NXMCallH.abstract: A webhook call, can use it for IP to IP and IP to PSTN.

Classes/NXMPage.html#/c:objc(cs)NXMPage(.name: size
Classes/NXMPage.html#/c:objc(cs)NXMPage(.abstract: Page size. Size could be greater than elements array’s size.

Classes/NXMEventsPage.html#/c:objc(cs)NX.name: events
Classes/NXMEventsPage.html#/c:objc(cs)NX.abstract: Events contained in the page. The array size could be smaller than the page size.

Classes/NXMEventsPage.html#/c:objc(cs)NX.name: -nextPage:
Classes/NXMEventsPage.html#/c:objc(cs)NX.abstract: Retrieves the next page. If the current page is the last, completionHandler will be called with an error.

Classes/NXMEventsPage.html#/c:objc(cs)NX.name: -previousPage:
Classes/NXMEventsPage.html#/c:objc(cs)NX.abstract: Retrieves the previous page. If the current page is the first, completionHandler will be called with an error.

Classes/NXMConversationsPage.html#/c:obj.name: conversations
Classes/NXMConversationsPage.html#/c:obj.abstract: Conversations contained in the page. The array size could be smaller than the page size.

Classes/NXMConversationsPage.html#/c:obj.name: -nextPage:
Classes/NXMConversationsPage.html#/c:obj.abstract: Retrieves the next page. If the current page is the last, completionHandler will be called with an error.

Classes/NXMConversationsPage.html#/c:obj.name: -previousPage:
Classes/NXMConversationsPage.html#/c:obj.abstract: Retrieves the previous page. If the current page is the first, completionHandler will be called with an error.

Classes/NXMLogger.html#/c:objc(cs)NXMLog.name: +getLogFileNames
Classes/NXMLogger.html#/c:objc(cs)NXMLog.abstract: get the log files name, while using NXMLogger

Classes/NXMLeg.html#/c:objc(cs)NXMLeg(py.name: uuid
Classes/NXMLeg.html#/c:objc(cs)NXMLeg(py.abstract: Indicates the unique identifier of the leg.

Classes/NXMLeg.html#/c:objc(cs)NXMLeg(py.name: date
Classes/NXMLeg.html#/c:objc(cs)NXMLeg(py.abstract: Indicates the started time of the current status of the leg.

Classes/NXMInitiator.html#/c:objc(cs)NXM.name: isSystem
Classes/NXMInitiator.html#/c:objc(cs)NXM.abstract: True when the member state initiator is not a user.

Classes/NXMInitiator.html#/c:objc(cs)NXM.name: userId
Classes/NXMInitiator.html#/c:objc(cs)NXM.abstract: Indicates the initiator user id of the member state ,has value when the initiator is not part of the conversation.

Classes/NXMInitiator.html#/c:objc(cs)NXM.name: memberId
Classes/NXMInitiator.html#/c:objc(cs)NXM.abstract: Indicates the initiator member id of the member state, has value when the initiator is part of the conversation.

Classes/NXMInitiator.html#/c:objc(cs)NXM.name: time
Classes/NXMInitiator.html#/c:objc(cs)NXM.abstract: Indicates the time when the initiator changed the member state.

Classes/NXMHelper.html#/c:objc(cs)NXMHel.name: +descriptionForEventType:
Classes/NXMHelper.html#/c:objc(cs)NXMHel.abstract: Provides a textual description for a given NXMEventType

Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).name: uuid
Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Conversation unique identifier.

Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).name: name
Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Conversation unique name.

Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).name: displayName
Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Conversation display name.

Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).name: lastEventId
Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Undocumented

Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).name: creationDate
Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Conversation creation date

Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).name: myMember
Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: The current user member

Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).name: allMembers
Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Conversation all members

Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).name: delegate
Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Conversation events delegate

Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).name: updatesDelegate
Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Conversation updates delegate

Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -inviteMemberWithUsername:completion:
Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: invite the user as a member of the conversation

Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -join:
Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Join the current user as a member of the conversation

Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -joinMemberWithUsername:completion:
Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Join a specific user as a member of the conversation

Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -leave:
Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Current user’s member leaves the conversation

Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -kickMemberWithMemberId:completion:
Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Kicks a member from participating in the conversation

Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -enableMedia
Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Enable media for the current user member

Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -disableMedia
Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Disable media for the current user member

Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -sendCustomWithEvent:data:completionHandler:
Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Send a custom event in the conversation

Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -sendText:completionHandler:
Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Sends a text message to the members of the conversation

Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -sendAttachmentWithType:name:data:completionHandler:
Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Sends an attachment message to the members of the conversation

Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -sendMarkSeenMessage:completionHandler:
Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Sends an indication that the current user’s member has seen a message

Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -sendStartTyping:
Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Sends an indication that the current user’s member started typing

Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -sendStopTyping:
Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Sends an indication that the current user’s member stopped typing

Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -getEventsPage:
Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Get conversation events page with 10 elements page size and ascending order.

Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -getEventsPageWithSize:order:completionHandler:
Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Get conversation events page.

Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -getEventsPageWithSize:order:eventType:completionHandler:
Classes/NXMConversation.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Get conversation events page.

Classes/NXMClient.html#/c:objc(cs)NXMCli.name: user
Classes/NXMClient.html#/c:objc(cs)NXMCli.abstract: Get the current user, the current user is the determine in the login by the token

Classes/NXMClient.html#/c:objc(cs)NXMCli.name: +setConfiguration:
Classes/NXMClient.html#/c:objc(cs)NXMCli.abstract: Set shared NXMClient configuration. Must be called before [NXMClient shared].

Classes/NXMClient.html#/c:objc(cs)NXMCli.name: -isConnected
Classes/NXMClient.html#/c:objc(cs)NXMCli.abstract: Check if the login connection status is connected

Classes/NXMClient.html#/c:objc(cs)NXMCli.name: -loginWithAuthToken:
Classes/NXMClient.html#/c:objc(cs)NXMCli.abstract: login with current authToken the response in NXMClientDelegate:didChangeConnectionStatus

Classes/NXMClient.html#/c:objc(cs)NXMCli.name: -logout
Classes/NXMClient.html#/c:objc(cs)NXMCli.abstract: logout the current user, the response in NXMClientDelegate:didChangeConnectionStatus

Classes/NXMClient.html#/c:objc(cs)NXMCli.name: -createConversationWithName:completionHandler:
Classes/NXMClient.html#/c:objc(cs)NXMCli.abstract: Create a new conversation with specific name: it is a unique per nexmo application

Classes/NXMClient.html#/c:objc(cs)NXMCli.name: -isNexmoPushWithUserInfo:
Classes/NXMClient.html#/c:objc(cs)NXMCli.abstract: Check if a push notification is a NexmoPush, Call this method on incoming push

Classes/NXMClient.html#/c:objc(cs)NXMCli.name: -processNexmoPushWithUserInfo:completionHandler:
Classes/NXMClient.html#/c:objc(cs)NXMCli.abstract: process Nexmo push, Call this method when isNexmoPushWithUserInfo:userInfo return true

Classes/NXMClient.html#/c:objc(cs)NXMCli.name: -processNexmoPushPayload:
Classes/NXMClient.html#/c:objc(cs)NXMCli.abstract: process Nexmo push event, Call this method when isNexmoPushWithUserInfo:userInfo return true

Classes/NXMCall.html#/c:objc(cs)NXMCall(.name: otherCallMembers
Classes/NXMCall.html#/c:objc(cs)NXMCall(.abstract: Indicates all the call members except my call member.

Classes/NXMClient.html.name: NXMClient
Classes/NXMClient.html.abstract: You use a NXMClient instance to utilise the services provided by NexmoConversation API in your app.
